In our sanitariums the truth is to be cherished, not banished or hidden from sight. The light is to shine forth in clear, distinct rays. [SEE ARTICLE, "THE SIGN OF OUR ORDER," IN "TESTIMONIES FOR THE CHURCH," VOL. 7, PP. 104-109.] These institutions are the Lord's facilities for the revival of pure, elevated morality. We do not establish them as a speculative 
                                                                           19
business, but to help men and women to follow right habits of living.
